doc:
Peggy Feury https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Peggy_Feury 0 Peggy Feury (30 June 1924 — 20 November 1985) (born Margaret Feury) was an actress on Broadway, in films, and on television. She became a highly regarded acting teacher in New York and then in Los Angeles. Throughout her career, she taught many notable students. Peggy_Feury ( 30_June_1924 — 20_November_1985 ) ( born Margaret_Feury ) was an_actress on Broadway , in films , and on television . She became a_highly_regarded_acting_teacher in New_York and then in Los_Angeles . Throughout her_career , she taught many_notable_students .
